title: David Hurley - Wikipedia
snippet: His term concluded in May 2019 and he was subsequently appointed by Queen Elizabeth II as governor-general on the nomination of Prime Minister Scott Morrison. His five-year term commenced in July 2019 and expired in July 2024, with Sam Mostyn succeeding him. David ...

title: David Hurley - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet: On 16 December 2018, it was said that Queen Elizabeth II had allowed Hurley to become the next Governor-General of Australia. This was on the advice of Prime Minister Scott Morrison. He began his term in July 2019. Hurley was born in Wollongong, New South Wales. He is married to Linda.

title: David John Hurley AC CVO DSC (Retd) – Parliament of Australia

title: General (Retd) the Honourable David Hurley AC CVO DSC and Mrs Linda Hurley | Soldier On Australia
snippet: General (Retd) the Honourable David Hurley AC CVO DSC was sworn in as the Governor-General of the Commonwealth of Australia on 1 July 2019 and completed his term on 30 June 2024. David Hurley joined the Australian Army in January 1972, graduating ...

title: Patron-in-Chief – His Excellency General the Honourable David Hurley AC DSC (Retd) |
snippet: Prior to being sworn in as Governor-General, David Hurley served as the 38th Governor of New South Wales from October 2014 – May 2019.
